appRoles.description: Allows members of a special preview group to use experimental features of Bing

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to search all calendars and to read their properties  for default on behalf of the signed-in user.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to search all calendars and to read their properties  for default on your behalf.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a scored list of relevant people of the signed-in user or other users in the signed-in user's organization.
publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read all users' relevant people lists
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a list of people in the order that is most relevant to you. Allows the app to read a list of people in the order that is most relevant to another user in your organization.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read all users' relevant people lists

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to search all calendars and to read their properties on behalf of the signed-in user.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to search all calendars and to read their properties on your behalf.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the application to read documents and list  items in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user
publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read items in all site collections
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allow the application to read documents and list items in all site collections on your behalf
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read items in all site collections

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read all files the signed-in user can access.
publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read all files that user can access
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read all files you can access.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read all files that you have access to

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to list QnA and to read their properties on behalf of the signed-in user.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to list QnA and to read their properties on your behalf.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to list bookmarks and to read their properties on behalf of the signed-in user.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to list bookmarks and to read their properties on your behalf.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to list groups, and to read their properties and all group memberships on behalf of the signed-in user.  Also allows the app to read calendar, conversations, files, and other group content for all groups the signed-in user can access.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to list groups, and to read their properties and all group memberships on your behalf.  Also allows the app to read calendar, conversations, files, and other group content for all groups you can access.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to list Acronym and to read their properties on behalf of the signed-in user.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to list Acronym and to read their properties on your behalf.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read power bi results in Microsoft search in Bing results
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read power bi results in Microsoft search in Bing results

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to search all topics and read their properties
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to search all topics and read their properties

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete events in user calendars.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create, and delete events in your calendars.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write to your calendars

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create suggested bookmarks
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to create suggested bookmarks

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on behalf of the signed-in user.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on your behalf.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to list floor plans and to read their properties on behalf of the signed-in user.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to list floor plans and to read their properties on your behalf.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to list buildings and to read their properties on behalf of the signed-in user.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to list buildings and to read their properties on your behalf.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to search all conversations and to read their properties on behalf of the signed-in user.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to search all conversations and to read their properties on your behalf.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read news feeds and to read their properties on behalf of the signed-in user.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read news feeds and to read their properties on your behalf.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Manage the state and settings of news feeds on behalf of the user.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to manage the state and settings of news feeds on your behalf.
